explanation: [0-0] On a yellow table sits a cup containing a white liquid. Above the cup is a silver metal object with many small, long holes.

[0-2] Next, two hands enter the frame from the right, holding a white heart-shaped piece of paper with handle-like strips on both ends. These hands place the white heart-shaped paper on top of the cup. Immediately afterward, a silver object with a filter on top appears at the top of the screen, the filter facing down.
